title: Spellbook of enchant weapon
data:
- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Spellbook_of_enchant_weapon\&action=edit)*

| [spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook") of +   enchant weapon   [![Light green spellbook.png](/images/7/7d/Light_green_spellbook.png)](/wiki/File:Light_green_spellbook.png) |                                                                                       |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                                                    | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance")                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                       |
| Base price                                                                                                                                                                    | 700 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                     |
| Weight                                                                                                                                                                        | [50](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                           |
| Turns to read                                                                                                                                                                 | 56                                                                                    |
| Ink to write                                                                                                                                                                  | [35–69](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker")                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                       |
| Spell type                                                                                                                                                                    | [enchantment](/wiki/Enchantment_spells "Enchantment spells")                          |
| Level                                                                                                                                                                         | 7                                                                                     |
| Power cost                                                                                                                                                                    | 35 [Pw](/wiki/Power "Power")                                                          |
| Direction                                                                                                                                                                     | non-directional                                                                       |
| Equivalent                                                                                                                                                                    | [scroll of enchant weapon](/wiki/Scroll_of_enchant_weapon "Scroll of enchant weapon") |

The **spellbook of enchant weapon** does not exist in [vanilla](/wiki/Vanilla "Vanilla") NetHack, but can be found in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") and also in [NetHack Plus](/wiki/NetHack_Plus "NetHack Plus") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").

The spellbook allows you to learn the enchant weapon spell. The spell is a level 7 Enchantment spell. Casting the spell has a chance based on skill level of acting as an uncursed [scroll of enchant weapon](/wiki/Scroll_of_enchant_weapon "Scroll of enchant weapon"). The chances of success are 1 in 8 at Expert, 1 in 10 at Skilled, 1 in 12 at Basic, and 1 in 14 at Unskilled or Restricted.

## Strategy

This spell has too high a level, and too high a failure rate even when cast successfully, to be useful for most characters. Non-[wizards](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard") will find the [spell hunger](/wiki/Spell_hunger "Spell hunger") to be fairly costly, not to mention the time spent recovering their [power](/wiki/Power "Power"). Moreover, the spell cannot give the effect of a blessed scroll.

Only [wizards](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard") might consider using the spell to save themselves a few charges on their [magic markers](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker"). And since wizards rely on spells instead of weapons, the real advantage is even smaller.

However, this spell, is probably useful for players attempting [conducts](/wiki/Conduct "Conduct").

## See also

- [Spellbook of enchant armor](/wiki/Spellbook_of_enchant_armor "Spellbook of enchant armor")
- [List of SLASH'EM spellbooks](/wiki/Spellcasting_\(SLASH%27EM\)#SLASH.27EM_spellbooks "Spellcasting (SLASH'EM)")

[![This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.](/images/3/38/Se7e7-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.")
html:
Spellbook of enchant weapon

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
spellbook of
+   enchant weapon  
Appearance random
Base price 700 zm
Weight 50
Turns to read 56
Ink to write 35–69
Spell type enchantment
Level 7
Power cost 35 Pw
Direction non-directional
Equivalent scroll of enchant weapon

The spellbook of enchant weapon does not exist in vanilla NetHack, but can be found in SLASH'EM and also in NetHack Plus and SlashTHEM.

The spellbook allows you to learn the enchant weapon spell. The spell is a level 7 Enchantment spell. Casting the spell has a chance based on skill level of acting as an uncursed scroll of enchant weapon. The chances of success are 1 in 8 at Expert, 1 in 10 at Skilled, 1 in 12 at Basic, and 1 in 14 at Unskilled or Restricted.

Strategy

This spell has too high a level, and too high a failure rate even when cast successfully, to be useful for most characters. Non-wizards will find the spell hunger to be fairly costly, not to mention the time spent recovering their power. Moreover, the spell cannot give the effect of a blessed scroll.

Only wizards might consider using the spell to save themselves a few charges on their magic markers. And since wizards rely on spells instead of weapons, the real advantage is even smaller.

However, this spell, is probably useful for players attempting conducts.

See also

  • Spellbook of enchant armor
  • List of SLASH'EM spellbooks

The '''spellbook of enchant weapon''' does not exist in [[vanilla]] NetHack, but can be found in [[SLASH'EM]] and also in [[NetHack Plus]] and [[SlashTHEM]].

Casting the spell has a chance based on skill level of acting as an uncursed [[scroll of enchant weapon]]. The chances of success are 1 in 8 at Expert, 1 in 10 at Skilled, 1 in 12 at Basic, and 1 in 14 at Unskilled or Restricted.

==Strategy==
This spell has too high a level, and too high a failure rate even when cast successfully, to be useful for most characters.  Non-[[wizard]]s will find the [[spell hunger]] to be fairly costly, not to mention the time spent recovering their [[power]].  Moreover, the spell cannot give the effect of a blessed scroll.

Only [[wizard]]s might consider using the spell to save themselves a few charges on their [[magic marker]]s. And since wizards rely on spells instead of weapons, the real advantage is even smaller.
